request.request_request:
array:6 [
  "_token" => "Gkcce0zQcpuezyCCfV0iYcqYeE9rNZfIpCCUjhVK"
  "title" => "“箭头”（=>）定义函数。"
  "author" => null
  "picname" => null
  "content" => """
    let name='hello';\r\n
            ()=>{\r\n
                console.log('name');\r\n
            };\r\n
    \r\n
            (name)=>{\r\n
                console.log(name);\r\n
            } ;\r\n
    \r\n
            let d= name=>{\r\n
                console.log(name);\r\n
            };\r\n
    \r\n
            (name,age)=>{\r\n
                console.log(name,age);\r\n
    \r\n
            };\r\n
    \r\n
            let c=(a,b)=>a+b;\r\n
    \r\n
            (a,b)=>{\r\n
                console.log(a+b);\r\n
            }\r\n
               console.log(c(1,2));\r\n
    \r\n
               \r\n
     ar f = v => v;\r\n
    上面的箭头函数等同于：\r\n
    \r\n
    var f = function(v) {\r\n
      return v;\r\n
    };\r\n
    如果箭头函数不需要参数或需要多个参数，就使用一个圆括号代表参数部分。\r\n
    \r\n
    由于大括号被解释为代码块，所以如果箭头函数直接返回一个对象，必须在对象外面加上括号。\r\n
    \r\n
    \r\n
    箭头函数可以与变量解构结合使用。\r\n
    dom2\r\n
      function foo() {\r\n
      fom( => {\r\n
        console.log('args:', fom);\r\n
      }, 100);\r\n
    }\r\n
    \r\n
    foo(2, 4, 6, 8)\r\n
    // args: [2, 4, 6, 8]\r\n
    上面代码中，箭头函数内部的变量fom,函数foo的arfom变量；\r\n
    \r\n
    参数默认值\r\n
    \r\n
       function sayHello(name){\r\n
        //传统的指定默认参数的方式\r\n
        var name=name||'dude';\r\n
        console.log('Hello '+name);\r\n
    }\r\n
    //运用ES6的默认参数\r\n
    function sayHello2(name='dude'){\r\n
        console.log(`Hello ${name}`);\r\n
    }\r\n
    sayHello();//输出：Hello dude\r\n
    sayHello('Wayou');//输出：Hello Wayou\r\n
    sayHello2();//输出：Hello dude\r\n
    sayHello2('Wayou');//输出：Hello Wayou\r\n
    不定参数\r\n
    \r\n
    //将所有参数相加的函数\r\n
    function add(...x){\r\n
        return x.reduce((m,n)=>m+n);\r\n
    }\r\n
    //传递任意个数的参数\r\n
    console.log(add(1,2,3));//输出：6\r\n
    console.log(add(1,2,3,4,5));//输出：15\r\n
    拓展参数\r\n
    \r\n
    var people=['Wayou','John','Sherlock'];\r\n
    //sayHello函数本来接收三个单独的参数人妖，人二和人三\r\n
    function sayHello(people1,people2,people3){\r\n
        console.log(`Hello ${people1},${people2},${people3}`);\r\n
    }\r\n
    //但是我们将一个数组以拓展参数的形式传递，它能很好地映射到每个单独的参数\r\n
    sayHello(...people);//输出：Hello Wayou,John,Sherlock \r\n
    \r\n
    //而在以前，如果需要传递数组当参数，我们需要使用函数的apply方法\r\n
    sayHello.apply(null,people);//输出：Hello Wayou,John,Sherlock
    """
  "Editor$Edit$lkbPost" => "发布"
]
